page.title: 06Yarrows' Typical Year RHS
page.content: {January.}Yarrows feed cattle, spread muck, clear snow and sell seed barley and 10 fat beast.{February.}They sell feeding barley and 16 fat beast with 40 tons of hay.{March}They sow spring corn, repair fences, sell 20 beast and buy in 40 store cattle.{April}Yarrows feed cattle, sell 25 beast and buy 40 cattle. They apply fertilizer, weed killers and fungicides.{May}They turn cattle out, sell corn and clean out grain store. They prepare machinery for haytime and harvest.{June.}Yarrows worm cattle, haymake and spray fungicides on corn.{July}Haymaking. {August.}They harvest and worm cattle. {September.}They finish harvesting, plough for winter corn and start to sow winter barley and wheat.{October Sow winter corn.{November}Spread muck and cut hedges.{December}Plough for spring corn, bring cattle inside.
